DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate performance novel silicone hydrogel contact lens , DAILIES TOTAL1® ( DT1 ) compare standard hydrogel material 1-DAY ACUVUE® MOIST® ( 1DAVM ) contact lens contact lens wearer identify contact lens-related dryness symptom .
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Study Two Daily Disposable Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: Three study visit occur course 28 ± 3 day .
DOC.criteria: Be legal age consent sign write Informed Consent Document HIPAA form . Currently wear soft contact lenses identify contact lensrelated dryness symptom base upon response Contact Lens Dry Eye Questionnaire . Wearing either daily disposable contact lenses biweekly/monthly replacement contact lenses , daily wear use ( extended wear use ) . Able achieve distance visual acuity least 20/25 eye study lenses available parameter , 0.50D 6.00D . Willing wear study lenses least 8 hours/day least 5 days/week . Willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Neophyte current wearer DAILIES TOTAL1® 1DAY ACUVUE® MOIST™ contact lens . Requires monovision presbyopic correction . Any systemic ocular disease disorder complicate factor structural abnormality would negatively affect conduct outcome study . Recent ( within 7 day enrollment ) current ocular infection , active ocular inflammation , glaucoma preauricular lymphadenopathy . Clinically significant lash lid abnormality . Systemic disease , investigator 's best judgment , would prohibit confound safe contact lens wear . History ocular surgery/trauma within last 6 month . Topical systemic antibiotic use within 7 day enrollment . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
